ios_app_store.subtitle: AI that gets your ADHD brain
ios_app_store.description: Finally, a productivity app designed specifically for ADHD minds. FocusFlow AI adapts to your unique energy patterns and attention cycles, suggesting the right tasks at the right time. Features energy-aware task matching, visual workflows, adaptive focus sessions, and hyperfocus protection. Built with ADHD research and community feedback.

android_play_store.short_description: AI-powered productivity for ADHD brains. Works with your patterns, not against them.
android_play_store.full_description: Tired of productivity apps that don't understand how your ADHD brain works? FocusFlow AI is different. Our adaptive technology learns your unique attention patterns and energy cycles to suggest the perfect tasks at the perfect time. Features include energy-aware AI matching, visual task workflows, hyperfocus protection, and accessibility built from the ground up. Join thousands of ADHD adults who've found their productivity flow.

keyword_strategy.competitor_analysis: Positioning against general productivity apps while avoiding medical claims

User story collection from beta testers
pre_launch.press_outreach: ADHD advocacy organizations, neurodiversity publications, productivity blogs
pre_launch.beta_testing_program: Invite-only beta with ADHD community leaders and advocates

launch_day.announcement_strategy: Coordinated launch across ADHD communities with authentic personal stories
launch_day.community_engagement: Live Q&A sessions in ADHD Facebook groups and Discord servers
